speaker: Prince Gog
message: ...and so as I was saying, I was the first of my siblings to grow legs therefore becoming a froglet don't you know. [i]RIBBIT[/i]

speaker: Prince Gog
message: And wouldn't you have it I began to feel a mighty hunger come on, and poor Jerome and the others were looking awfully...

speaker: Prince Gog
message: I popped him in my mouth and he actually tasted quite delightful, and Bob's your uncle there I was gorging myself upon my brothers and sisters.

speaker: Prince Gog
message: By the time our attendant Crumbit had gotten back to our nursing pond I was downing little Marjorie and poof, I was an only child ha ha ha. [i]CROAK[/i]

speaker: narrator
message: [i]Prince Gog hands you a small wooden toy.[/i]

speaker: Prince Gog
message: For you! A fine companion to remember me by! Ghak har ha!

speaker: narrator
message: [i]The soldier's worn limbs clank limply in your hand. Half concealed under decades of grime, you feel the outline of a sentence on it's back. "Proud property of Jerome." It gives you a pleading look through cracked painted eyes.[/i]

speaker: Prince Gog
message: So Lord Robert Allenby tells me that your people don't necessarily engage in that sort of fratricide but my dear you look as though you could eat any number of your... kind?

speaker: narrator
message: [i]You ponder the best method to dispose of this wretched gift on your way back to the castle with Prince Gog.[/i]
